contents:
他昨天特地去纽约看望了弟弟。

看他的時候是週五，去世的時候他還在高爾夫俱樂部。On Saturday, when Robert Trump was not expected to live much longer, the president, 74, called into the hospital from his Bedminster, N.J., golf club. A short time later, the president held a wide-ranging news conference, where he refused to say whether Kamala Harris was eligible to run for national office, giving credence to a false assertion that Ms. Harris, born in California, was not eligible because her parents were immigrants.
https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.nytimes.com/2020/08/15/us/politics/robert-s-trump-dead.amp.html
